description: Grafana home page of the transcode.eth dashboards.

options.content: ## Transcode.eth **Transcode.eth**, aka **Transcode.ninja**, operates with ninja-like agility‚Äîswift, agile, and precise in every transcoding task. Fueled by a 1 Gbps down and high-uptime internet connection near Frankfurt and London nodes, our services offer high performance, low latency, and unwavering reliability. ü•∑ ### Key Features - **Low Latency:** Real-time transcoding for broadcasters and viewers. - **High Performance:** With the capacity to scale directly to three NVIDIA 1070 cards or higher, transcode.eth ensures consistent excellence in meeting demand. - **Transparency:** Operations, tools, and metrics proudly shared on [Transcode.ninja](https://transcode.ninja). - **High Uptimes:** Ensuring stability with robust internet and strategic positioning. ### Value Proposition #### For Delegators: - **Transparent Operations:** Track performance via public dashboards for trust and transparency. - **Stable Returns:** High-performance transcoding, strategic location, and high uptimes contribute to reliable returns. #### For Broadcasters: - **Low Latency:** Real-time transcoding for a smooth streaming experience. - **High-Quality Output:** Consistently delivers superior transcoded videos. - **Reliability:** High uptimes and strategic positioning provide a reliable transcoding solution. ### Get Involved Explore Transcode.eth's power by delegating your Livepeer tokens. - [ Delegate Now: Delegate to Transcode.eth](https://explorer.livepeer.org/accounts/0x5bdeedca9c6346b0ce6b17ffa8227a4dace37039/orchestrating) ### Contact Us For inquiries, feedback, or collaboration opportunities: - **Discord:** [rickstaa](https://discordapp.com/users/700320643962634300) Thanks for choosing Transcode.eth‚Äîwhere speed, agility, and strategic connectivity combine to enhance your video transcoding experience on Livepeer!

In our pursuit of transparency, we openly share orchestrator insights through public dashboards hosted on [GitHub](https://github.com/rickstaa/livepeer-setup). If you have suggestions or specific data you'd like to see, please share your ideas [here](https://github.com/rickstaa/livepeer-setup/issues/new?assignees=&labels=enhancement&projects=&template=feature_request.yml). **Dashboards Overview:** 1. Orchestrator Overview: Explore performance scores, active sessions, rewards, and more. 2. Orchestrator Payments Overview: Delve into payment insights, including the total ETH distributed to delegators, ETH payouts to the orchestrator, and the associated energy costs in generating income.

At transcode.eth, an open-source ethos is central to our philosophy. We share tools for transparency and collaboration, including:

- **[livepeer-exporter](https://github.com/rickstaa/livepeer-exporter):** A lightweight Prometheus exporter for Livepeer orchestrator metrics, seamlessly integrating with diverse Livepeer endpoints. Explore its capabilities on our [GitHub repository](https://github.com/rickstaa/livepeer-exporter) and join us in fostering an open and collaborative ecosystem.

1. ‚úÖ **Setup Orchestrator and Conduct Initial Performance Tests**
   - Successfully set up the orchestrator and conducted preliminary performance tests on the Livepeer network to ensure a robust foundation.

2. ‚úÖ **Create Grafana Dashboards**
   - Implemented Grafana dashboards to achieve full operational transparency, providing detailed insights into orchestrator performance.

3. ‚úÖ **Develop Livepeer Prometheus Exporter**
   - Created a Livepeer Prometheus exporter and shared it with the community to enhance the performance of orchestrator dashboards.

4. ‚è≥ **Conduct Rigorous Performance and Income Tests**
   - Currently conducting extensive performance and income tests on the network with the new setup to ensure optimal functionality.

5. üöß **Brand Creation, Website Development, and Community Engagement**
   - Establishing a distinct branding identity for Transcode.eth.
   - Developing a website to showcase services and features and foster community engagement.
   - Assessing demand for a dedicated Discord server, providing delegators a space to connect and engage.
   - Setting up official social media accounts for Transcode.eth to actively engage with the community.

6. üöß **Implement Delegator Voting Mechanism**
   - Introducing a mechanism for delegators to participate actively in voting processes.

7. üöß **Additional Delegator Reward Mechanism**
   - Explore and plan to implement additional reward mechanisms for delegators, such as NFTs or voting tokens.

8. üöß **Evaluate Demand for Private Pool and Multi-Orchestrator Setup**
   - Assessing the demand for a private pool and considering transitioning to a multi-orchestrator setup if necessary.

title: Home
